description: Try our easy to follow Crepes With Strawberry Jam recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crepes With Strawberry Jam Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour quarter of mixture to cover base of pan, then cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Repeat with oil and remaining mixture to make 4 crepes. Serve with jam.
